column4: Does ANYONE know what the deal with NetworkManager Applet is?  It's driving me crazy.
i know the deal... 3 queens and a low spade

Okay... first off: It has NO configuration options.  You can ONLY disable/enable it.  Next: It's ALWAYS wrong.  When I'm connected (wired OR wireless), it says "no connections."  Third: I CAN'T GET RID OF IT!  The "Delete" option in GNOME startup session manager is grayed out, and I "Disabled" it but it's STILL there.
you know your right... it isn't a very good applet
